titleStmt.title: Praiers of holi fathers, patryarches, prophetes, iudges, kynges, and renowmed men and wemen of eyther testamente
Bible. English. Selections.
titleStmt.author: Brunfels, Otto, 1488-1534. Precationes Biblicae.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Grafton .. These bookes are to bee solde at the weste doore of P[aule]s in London. By Wyllyam Tylotson,

notesStmt.note: Extracts from the Bible, based on: Brunfels, Otto. Precationes Biblicae.

Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
